page.title: 15Reactions to Filming.
page.content: Hambleden village has been used frequently for filming.When we went to the village,we asked people's opinions of the filming.Most people said that they did not mind the film crews coming so long as they tidied up afterwards and did not take over the village. The shopkeeper said that it brought new faces to the village. One person said that it stopped the traffic too much and her husband could not get to work on time. The policeman said that he liked it and it had to be done. The school children enjoyed it very much and hoped it did not stop people doing what they wanted. A lot of people enjoyed watching the actors and camera men and looked forward to watching the serial on the television.
